item.title: Start here!!!
item.description: Anne’s Awesome Guide to Coding (Preface) I hope you find this useful! You can use this guide to reference all the lessons to be posted in the future. Learn how to use the terminal I know the terminal is scary but you can do it!! The terminal is absolutely necessary in order to navigate your computer file structure. You need to do this in order to find the correct files and run the code you write!
